title: Download speed drops from 1,000kbs to 300kbs
body: My download speed keeps dropping when the launcher is patching, why does this happens?

replies.body: You should be able to get a bit of a faster download if you use a hardwired connection instead of wifi. If you already are, double check some of your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to see if there's something you could update there to get those download speeds back up to pace.
